docs.text: Deployment Architecture You will design and document your architecture to deploy your model and integrate it with the web application. For example, this diagram was created by the Labs 17 Cryptolytic DS team : Resources Third party Soledad Galli, Deployment of Machine Learning Models (Udemy course, 8 hours of videos, $12) Lambda students Elizabeth Ter Sahakyan, Create An API To Deploy Machine Learning Models Using Flask and Heroku Marvin Davila, Deploying a Flask App to AWS Elastic Beanstalk Marvin Davila, How to Create an AWS Lambda Function in Cloud9 Quinn Dougherty, Build Week Survival Guide: Data Engineering FastAPI FastAPI is an alternative to Flask. It gives you "automatic interactive API documentation." repo docs screencasts
